ModMetaData.name: Adjustable Trade Costs
ModMetaData.author: cluder
ModMetaData.description:
Adjustable Trade Costs
This mod lets you adjust the goodwill costs of requesting a trade caravan. The default goodwill cost is reduced from 15 to 5.
Note: Rimworld needs to be restarted after a change in the mod settings.
Dependencies: This mod only depends on Harmony.
Source: https://github.com/cluder/RimworldMod_AdjustableTradeCosts
